name: Alice's Adventures. Hidden Object
description:
Have you always dreamed of joining Alice as she journeys in Wonderland and Through the Looking Glass? In this Hidden Objects game, your dream comes true! Help the heroine solve puzzles and find cleverly disguised clues so she can advance through this wondrous land.

Colorful 360 degree scenery, animation, and 3D visual effects will make your adventure vivid and fun. Those with a competitive streak can repeat the quest with new puzzles and have an opportunity to contend with other players. Key features:
  • Experience unusual 360-degree panoramas and 3D views!
  • Vibrant interiors
  • Diverse challenges: there is the classic hidden objects based on name or outlines, finding identical items, and search for pairs of items.

Another nice bonus: you will probably reach for Lewis Carroll's classic once again, and if your child has not read the book yet, playing the game together will be a sure way to spark interest! Dive into the world of fantasy!
